issue.title: [C++][Python] Segfaults for unsupported datatypes in the ORC writer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16817](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16817). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the ORC writer if a table has at least a column with unsupported datatype segfaults occur when we try to write them in ORC.
